name: Dregg
content:
Corporal Dregg was a male Human soldier who served in the Mantellian army of the Galactic Republic during the Cold War.
Stationed on Ord Mantell during the Separatist War, Corporal Dregg and two other Mantellian soldiers, Ensigns Ta and Peters, devised a life-or-death game of chance in the region. They challenged refugees in the area to run the mines and gather three unexploded shells. They allowed bets on the outcomes of these runs, and anyone who succeeded was awarded equipment from the relief supplies.
